item.title: token session cookie localStroage
item.author: TRoYals
item.description: 一个启发式学习的案例，通过chatGPT | Feature | Session | Cookie | Token | |———|———|——–|——-| |Location | Server-side | Client-side | Client-side | |State | Stateful | Stateless | Stateless | |Lifetime | Expires after a period of inactivity or when the user logs out | Persistent or session-only | Expires after a certain period
